basics.whatHappened: Employee reported harassment by coworker during team meeting

qa.question: What type of harassment occurred?
qa.answer: Verbal harassment including inappropriate comments and belittling remarks

qa.question: Were there any witnesses to the incident?
qa.answer: Yes, three other team members were present during the meeting

qa.question: Has this type of behavior been reported before?
qa.answer: This is the first formal complaint, but there have been informal concerns raised
